channel.title: chatgpt on New Linux User
channel.description: Recent content in chatgpt on New Linux User

item.title: ShellGPT
item.description: How to Set up and Use ChatGPT in Linux Terminal Artificial Intelligence has taken center stage as the tech sector's new darling. Platforms like ChatGPT and its kin are thriving online, streamlining a plethora of routine tasks for users. In our previous releases, we've covered the basics of crafting a ChatGPT-esque chat-bot, leveraging Bing AI across various browsers, among other topics. But what if you're operating within the Linux ecosystem and yearn to integrate the savvy of AI chat-bots into your workflow?
